title: Stuffed best end of hogget with potato fondant and buttered cabbage
description: Hogget bridges the gap between lamb and mutton and can take on strong flavours. Try serving this stuffed best-end cut with cabbage, potatoes and gravy.
ingredients: 1 x pair best end of neck of hogget, bones removed
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
6 potatoes, peeled and cut into 8cm/31/2in discs
1 small Savoy cabbage, cored, quartered and finely shredded
